key_news.headline: Costco Reports Strong January Sales Results - 9.3% Growth
key_news.summary: Net sales of $21.33 billion for January 2026, up from $19.51 billion last year

key_news.headline: Mini Beignets Recall Due to Mislabeling
key_news.summary: Caramel mini beignets mislabeled as chocolate hazelnut, distributed across 22 states

key_news.headline: 14 New Products Launch in February 2026
key_news.summary: Chocolate Chip Cookie Bar Cake and Peanut Butter Monster Cookies lead new product rollout

key_news.headline: Q1 2026 Earnings Beat Expectations
key_news.summary: Net income $2,001M ($4.50/share) vs $1,798M ($4.04/share) last year; digital sales up 20.5%

Monterrey, Mexico Store Opening (Largest in Latin America)
